name: Death Cave (itch)
description:
You need the orange polymer it will help you to find the way out of the cave.

Hint: at the ceiling.

Modifications:

1. A comprehensive level.

2. Change audio and music.

3. Change UIs.

4. Change lightings.

Credits: 

A game made by Alhanuof Alhamad with assets from MSU.

Fonts:

- UIs: Copyright (c) 2011 by vernon adams (vern@newtypography.co.uk).

- Scratched texts' font used in the level: https://www.1001fonts.com/

Music: from the artist CryoChamber

 

Hope you enjoy it!

Looking forward for your reviews and comments!
